review: Fantastic.  I love it.  A new way to watch TV.
author: James Glen

review: I have been waiting for this and what a success!!If you are an amazon user and a prime user this is a must. This give you all your content including cloud content accessible anywhere there is WiFiI love itThank you Amazon!!!
author: StriderHyru

review: Best ever!! I'm canceling Netflix tomorrow - Fire Stick is the greatest!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Movies are advertised as free- they are not. In the "first run" category you must pay. Variety is lacking on new movies. I feel misled.Easy to install and use. Mirrors AppleTV.
author: Barb K

review: Fire TV Stick is faster than my old Roku.  I am unable to get Dolby Digital output to my stereo whereas my Roku does with no issues.  Navigation is nice n smooth.  I just wished I had prime so I could use other features.  Currently use with PLEX and other available media apps.
author: RBSC

review: Have only been using it for just over a week and so far, so good. We primarily use the Netflix and Amazon apps and both have worked well. The Hulu app seems to slow down and freeze a lot. If you get one, be sure to explore the other apps: last night I found the PBS app, documentary app and a few more. We used to stream via a computer and having a remote is great!
author: USR

review: Was slow to setup but after some time works well. The app is little slow too but does work.  Overall is above average with the performance
author: Toby Dean Everroad

review: Very poor performance. For something with decent specs, I didn't expect the UI to be so sluggish and the wifi on it to be so poor. My tv is literally 3 feet from my router and streaming would have audible/visual hiccups every minute or so.
author: Jamezeite

review: Amazing product! Apples to apples compared to  Chromecast, the Chromecast doesn't hold a candle!
author: Meredith Nunnally

review: 5 Stars for doing exactly what it said it did. Took a minute to pair with Wi-Fi, but runs very smoothly and pretty fast for a stick. Wish they had HBOgo app.
author: norma murdoch-kitt
